description.en: The Gloves of the fabled Almighty Dragon King Set. Wearing all 4 pieces will grant you amazing bonuses! Don the mask and or cloak for even more powa!
description.ar: The Gloves of the fabled Almighty Dragon King Set. Wearing all 4 pieces will grant you amazing bonuses! Don the mask and or cloak for even more powa!
description.br: As Luvas do fabuloso Dragão-rei Todo-Poderoso.
description.de: Die Handschuhe des sagenumwobenen Almighty Dragon King Sets. Trage alle 4 Teile, um erstaunliche Boni zu erhalten! Trage die Maske und/oder den Umhang, um noch mehr Macht zu haben!
description.fi: The Gloves of the fabled Almighty Dragon King Set. Wearing all 4 pieces will grant you amazing bonuses! Don the mask and or cloak for even more powa!
description.fil: The Gloves of the fabled Almighty Dragon King Set. Wearing all 4 pieces will grant you amazing bonuses! Don the mask and or cloak for even more powa!
description.fr: Les Gants de l'incroyable set du Dragon-Roi Tout-Puissant. Porter les 4 pièces d'équipement accorde de fantastiques bonus ! Portez le masque et/ou la cape pour encore plus de puissance !
description.id: The Gloves of the fabled Almighty Dragon King Set. Mengenakan semua 4 buah akan memberi Anda bonus luar biasa! Kenakan topeng dan atau jubah untuk lebih banyak kekuatan!
description.it: The Gloves of the fabled Almighty Dragon King Set. Wearing all 4 pieces will grant you amazing bonuses! Don the mask and or cloak for even more powa!
description.jp: 破壊の竜王セットのグローブ。セットで装備すると効果絶大！マスクやマント着用でさらにステータスアップ！
description.kr: 전설의 전능 드래곤 킹 세트의 장갑입니다. 4벌 모두 입으면 놀라운 보너스를 받을 수 있습니다! 더 강해지려면 마스크와 망토를 착용하세요!
description.nl: The Gloves of the fabled Almighty Dragon King Set. Wearing all 4 pieces will grant you amazing bonuses! Don the mask and or cloak for even more powa!
description.pl: The Gloves of the fabled Almighty Dragon King Set. Wearing all 4 pieces will grant you amazing bonuses! Don the mask and or cloak for even more powa!
description.ru: The Gloves of the fabled Almighty Dragon King Set. Wearing all 4 pieces will grant you amazing bonuses! Don the mask and or cloak for even more powa!
description.sp: Los Guantes del Conjunto del legendario Rey Dragón Todopoderoso. ¡Usar las 4 partes te otorgará bonificaciones increíbles! ¡Ponte la máscara y/o la capa para obtener aún más poder!
description.sw: The Gloves of the fabled Almighty Dragon King Set. Wearing all 4 pieces will grant you amazing bonuses! Don the mask and or cloak for even more powa!
description.th: ถุงมือของเซ็ตราชามังกรผู้ยิ่งใหญ่ในตำนาน การสวมใส่ทั้ง 4 ชิ้นจะทำให้คุณได้รับโบนัสที่น่าทึ่ง! สวมหน้ากากและหรือปิดบังเพื่อความสวยงามยิ่งขึ้นไปอีก!
description.tw: 傳說中的全能破壞龍王套裝的手套。 穿上所有4件將給你驚人的額外加乘！戴上面具和/或斗篷以獲得更多波瓦！
description.vi: Găng tay của Bộ Long Vương Toàn Năng trong truyện ngụ ngôn. Mặc tất cả 4 mảnh sẽ cấp cho bạn tiền thưởng tuyệt vời! Hãy đeo mặt nạ và hoặc áo choàng để có thêm sức mạnh!
